thread.title: Brad Pitt and Angelina Jolie Are Reportedly Talking Again
thread.title_full: Brad Pitt and Angelina Jolie Are Reportedly Talking Again

title: Brad Pitt and Angelina Jolie Are Reportedly Talking Again
text: Brad Pitt and Angelina Jolie Are Reportedly Talking Again Getty By Alyssa Bailey Mar 22, 2017 Brad Pitt and Angelina Jolie, who filed for divorce last September , spent months in a very public—and at times ugly—custody battle over their six children. But People reports that the two are making peace and have now talked directly to each other. "It was a rough time, but they were able to resolve it," a source close to Pitt told the outlet. "This is a work in progress." Pitt has "always been extremely positive about how Angie's a good mother, and the goal was to resolve everything for the kids and the whole family, and they're working toward that," the source added.   In January, the couple announced they were sealing all court documents relating to their divorce. "The parents are committed to act as a united front to effectuate recovery and reunification," they said in a joint statement released then to CNN. More on the Brangelina Divorce
